title: Internet Download Manager 6.12 Final Build 24 + Patchs
description:
Note 1 : Fully in Portuguese of Brazil, including other languages

Note 2 : If your antivirus says that Patches (Activation, keygen) are viruses, not mind is a false alarm, if it happens disable your antivirus temporarily.

*Instrucions of Activation*

English

Patch 1

Install the program that the Installer folder in Programs and then close the program completely then copy the entire contents of the folder for the Activation folder where you installed the program, after copying press the right mouse button in the Patch file.
Then hit Run As Administrator then the program will open and press the button PATCH.
Ready to eat using Download Accelerator Better World.

Patch 1 does not work use this one

Patch 2

1. - Install the program.
2 -. Close the program, which is also minimized to the tray icon (near the clock).
3 -. Go To Folder then go to Activation Patch 2 folder run the patch-patch IDM.v6.xx.release.3 Run as Administrator and click "Patch", locate the file "IDMan.exe" which is "C:  program Files  Internet Download Manager "or where you installed program or other alternative paste the patch in the folder where the program is installed.
Pressing patch will ask you to put your data Name & Surname
Ready your IDM is already activated.
